dcterms:creator: F. Martelli
N. Kalach
G. Tola
R. Navigli
dcterms:description: The dataset for the SemEval-2021 Task 2 focuses on multilingual and cross-lingual word-in-context disambiguation, providing training and testing data for various languages including Arabic, Chinese, English, French, and Russian.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2021 Task 2: Multilingual and Cross-lingual Word-in-Context Disambiguation
